name: Thai Chicken Satay
recipeIngredient: 500g chicken breast ( cut into 1 in wide 3 in long)
1/4 cup coarsely ground roast peanut or peanut
1 cucumber ( sliced in quarters lenght then sliced thin)
recipeInstructions: 1. Cut the chicken into thin wide strips. A single strip will be threaded on a skewer lengthways.
2. Make the marinade, by combining all the dry ingredients in a food processor, then adding the liquids.
3. Add the chicken to the marinade, cover with clingfilm, and refrigerate for 2 hours.
4. To make the satay sauce, put the coarsely ground peanuts in a pan,then add the red curry paste, and coconut milk. Bring to the boil, then turn down the heat and add the remaining ingredients.
5. To make the cucumber relish, put the vinegar in a small pan, add the sugar, and dissolve over  low heat. Turn off the heat and allow to cool. Add the cucumber, shallot and chilli.
